item.title: Spring Read Classpath Resource using ApplicationContext
item.description: In this Java Spring Framework tutorial, we learn how to read classpath resources in a Spring application using ApplicationContext class. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); For example, we have a text file located at /src/main/resources/data.json in the Spring application project. Next step, we implement a new class named ResourceService and implement two methods to read the data.json file as a Resource object and as a String object.
